Isaiah or Isaias__34.1: Come near, ye Gentiles, and hear, and hearken, ye people: let the earth hear, and all that is therein, the world, and every thing that cometh forth of it.
Isaiah or Isaias__34.2: For the indignation of the Lord if upon all nations, and his fury upon all their armies: he hath killed them, and delivered them to slaughter.
Isaiah or Isaias__34.3: Their slain shall be cast forth, and out of their carcasses shall rise a slink: the mountains shall be melted with their blood.
Isaiah or Isaias__34.4: <u>And all the host of the heavens</u> shall pine away, and the heavens shall be folded together as a book: and all their host shall fall down as the leaf falleth from the vine, and from the fig tree.
Isaiah or Isaias__34.5: For my sword is inebriated in heaven: behold it shall come down upon <u>Idumea</u>, and upon the people of my slaughter unto judgment.
Isaiah or Isaias__34.6: The sword of the Lord is filled with blood, it is made thick with the blood of lambs and buck goats, with the blood of rams full of marrow: for there is a victim of the Lord in Bosra and a great slaughter in the land of Edom.
Isaiah or Isaias__34.7: And <u>the unicorns</u> shall go down with them, and the bulls with the mighty: their land shall be soaked with blood, and their ground with the fat of fat ones.
Isaiah or Isaias__34.8: For it is the day of the vengeance of the Lord, <u>the year of recompenses</u> of the judgment of Sion.
Isaiah or Isaias__34.9: And the streams thereof shall be turned into pitch, and the ground thereof into brimstone: and the land thereof shall become burning pitch.
Isaiah or Isaias__34.10: Night and day it shall not be quenched, the smoke thereof shall go up for ever: from generation to generation it shall lie waste, none shall pass through it for ever and ever.
Isaiah or Isaias__34.11: The bittern and ericius shall possess it: and the ibis and the raven shall dwell in it: and a line shall be stretched out upon it, to bring it to nothing, and a plummet, unto desolation.
Isaiah or Isaias__34.12: The nobles thereof shall not be there: they shall call rather upon the king, and all the princes thereof shall be nothing.
Isaiah or Isaias__34.13: And thorns and nettles shall grow up in its houses, and the thistle in the fortresses thereof: and it shall be the habitation of dragons, and the pasture of ostriches.
Isaiah or Isaias__34.14: And demons and monsters shall meet, and the hairy ones shall cry out one to another, there hath the lamia lain down, and found rest for herself.
Isaiah or Isaias__34.15: There hath the ericius had its hole, and brought up its young ones, and hath dug round about, and cherished them in the shadow thereof: thither are the kites gathered together one to another.
Isaiah or Isaias__34.16: Search ye diligently in the book of the Lord, and read: not one of them was wanting, one hath not sought for the other: for that which proceedeth out of my mouth, he hath commanded, and his spirit it hath gathered them.
Isaiah or Isaias__34.17: And he hath cast the lot for them, and his hand hath divided it to them by line: they shall possess it for ever, from generation to generation they shall dwell therein.
